reference.shortdesc: A subtitle is an subordinate title for a resource to be used to augment the information about the resource in certain display contexts.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Subtitles specify a subordinate title to be displayed alongside the title in certain display contexts.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: The subtitle element is a specialization of titlealt with the title-role set to subtitle. Processing is dictated by the rules for titlealt.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The subtitle element is specialized from titlealt. It is defined in the alternativeTitle-domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and the attribute listed below.

dlentry.dd: Specifies the role or roles fulfilled by the alternative title. On this element the value has a default value of subtitle.

example.title: Examples
example.p: This section contains examples of how the subtitle element can be used.
